title: 01-13-2023 Liberty RoundTable with Sam Bushman
creator: Loving Liberty Radio Network
subject: Podcast
description: Hour 1 * Guest: Dr. Scott Bradley, Founder and Chairman of the Constitution  Commemoration Foundation and the author of the book and DVD/CD lecture  series \"To Preserve the Nation.\" In the Tradition of the Founding  Fathers - FreedomsRisingSun.com * Trump: My plan to TAKE DOWN the cartels - Details war plan against drug cartels. * Ron Paul: Tell Your Representative to DEFUND THE TSA! * \"Dear Joe, please don't let us freeze\" - On October 27, the CEO of  New England's largest energy company Eversource CEO Joe Nolan sent a  desperate letter to the White House - He then begged Joe Biden to use  the federal government's emergency powers to make sure natural gas will  be available in New England this winter. * George Santos still has the backing of House Speaker Kevin McCarthy  and other House Republican leaders. In a news conference at the Capitol  on Thursday, Mr. McCarthy made it clear that he had no intention of  barring Mr. Santos from congressional committees or otherwise penalizing  him for winning election under false pretenses. 'The voters of his  district have elected him,' Mr. McCarthy said. 'He is seated. He is part  of the Republican conference. Hour 2 * Guest: Steven Kovac, National News Reporter - TheEpochTimes.com * In October 2022, Colorado Secretary of State's Office Admits It  Mailed Over 31,000 Voter Registration Instruction Cards to Noncitizens. * 150,000 Votes in the 2020 Election Not Tied to a Valid Address in Wisconsin. * Wisconsin Special Counsel Finds Zuckerberg's Election Money Violated State Bribery Laws | Facts Matter - Roman Balmakov. * The special counsel who was appointed to study the 2020 election in  Wisconsin submitted his official report, in which he determined that  the millions of dollars that Mark Zuckerberg spent on the Wisconsin  election violated the state's laws in regard to bribery - Multiple other  issues the special counsel found, which included unconstitutional drop  boxes, illegal directives from the elections commission in regard to  nursing homes, as well as problems with the voter rolls themselves. * Kevin McCarthy signaled to reporters that he would consider  expunging one or both of former President Trump's impeachments,  according to The Hill. * All-Muslim City Council in the Detroit suburb of Hamtramck Approves Animal Sacrifices at Home - Jack Davis, TheEpochTimes.com * Joe Rogan calls out leftist billionaire George Soros: 'It's like he  wants these cities to fall apart. He wants crime to flourish.' * 98% of US CEOs anticipate that America will face a recession in 2023, according to The WSJ. * Several Illinois sheriffs will not enforce the state's recently  passed gun law, with many arguing it violates the Second Amendment,  according to NBC Chicago. --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/loving-liberty/support

metadata.creator: Loving Liberty Radio Network
metadata.description:
Hour 1
* Guest: Dr. Scott Bradley, Founder and Chairman of the Constitution  Commemoration Foundation and the author of the book and DVD/CD lecture  series \"To Preserve the Nation.\" In the Tradition of the Founding  Fathers - FreedomsRisingSun.com

* Trump: My plan to TAKE DOWN the cartels - Details war plan against drug cartels.

* Ron Paul: Tell Your Representative to DEFUND THE TSA!

* \"Dear Joe, please don't let us freeze\" - On October 27, the CEO of  New England's largest energy company Eversource CEO Joe Nolan sent a  desperate letter to the White House - He then begged Joe Biden to use  the federal government's emergency powers to make sure natural gas will  be available in New England this winter.

* George Santos still has the backing of House Speaker Kevin McCarthy  and other House Republican leaders. In a news conference at the Capitol  on Thursday, Mr. McCarthy made it clear that he had no intention of  barring Mr. Santos from congressional committees or otherwise penalizing  him for winning election under false pretenses. 'The voters of his  district have elected him,' Mr. McCarthy said. 'He is seated. He is part  of the Republican conference.

Hour 2
* Guest: Steven Kovac, National News Reporter - TheEpochTimes.com

* In October 2022, Colorado Secretary of State's Office Admits It  Mailed Over 31,000 Voter Registration Instruction Cards to Noncitizens.

* 150,000 Votes in the 2020 Election Not Tied to a Valid Address in Wisconsin.

* Wisconsin Special Counsel Finds Zuckerberg's Election Money Violated State Bribery Laws | Facts Matter - Roman Balmakov.

* The special counsel who was appointed to study the 2020 election in  Wisconsin submitted his official report, in which he determined that  the millions of dollars that Mark Zuckerberg spent on the Wisconsin  election violated the state's laws in regard to bribery - Multiple other  issues the special counsel found, which included unconstitutional drop  boxes, illegal directives from the elections commission in regard to  nursing homes, as well as problems with the voter rolls themselves.

* Kevin McCarthy signaled to reporters that he would consider  expunging one or both of former President Trump's impeachments,  according to The Hill.

* All-Muslim City Council in the Detroit suburb of Hamtramck Approves Animal Sacrifices at Home - Jack Davis, TheEpochTimes.com

* Joe Rogan calls out leftist billionaire George Soros: 'It's like he  wants these cities to fall apart. He wants crime to flourish.'

* 98% of US CEOs anticipate that America will face a recession in 2023, according to The WSJ.

* Several Illinois sheriffs will not enforce the state's recently  passed gun law, with many arguing it violates the Second Amendment,  according to NBC Chicago.

--- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/loving-liberty/support

metadata.title: 01-13-2023 Liberty RoundTable with Sam Bushman
